name: claude-domestique
description: Claude Code plugin marketplace - memento, mantra, onus

scripts.test: npm run test:mantra && npm run test:memento && npm run test:onus
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:mantra && npm run test:coverage:memento && npm run test:coverage:onus
scripts.install:all: cd mantra && npm install && cd ../memento && npm install && cd ../onus && npm install
